extendedInfo.description: Muslim's Prayers times is yet other Prayer times reminder with cool features: Adhan, Qibla direction, Hijri calendar and moon phases.Ø§ÙÙØ§Øª Ø§ÙØµÙØ§Ù Ø§ÙØ§Ù ÙØ¯Ø¹Ù Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙÙ ØªØ¨Ø¹Ø§ ÙØ§Ø¹Ø¯Ø§Ø¯Ø§Øª Ø§ÙØ¬ÙØ§Ø²ÙØªÙØ­ Ø§ÙØ¨Ø±ÙØ§ÙØ¬ Ø®ØµØ§Ø¦Øµ Ø¹Ø¯ÙØ¯ÙØ§ÙÙØ¤Ø°Ù Ø§ÙØ§ÙØªÙÙØ§ØªÙÙÙ, Ø§ØªØ¬Ø§Ù Ø§ÙÙØ¨ÙÙ, Ø§ÙØªÙÙÙÙ Ø§ÙÙØ¬Ø±Ù Ù Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ø± Ø§ÙÙÙØ±â it includes:* An app that displays prayers for current day and displays corresponding hijri date, Allow you to choose the date you want.* A hijri calendar that displays hijri month, corresponding gregorian days. when clicking a day important islamic events and moon phase will be displayed.* Prayers quibla and a compass.* Customizable azan before prayers, you can choose from a list of azans or your file from SD card, can be customized for each prayer.* Silence phone during prayers that can be customized for each prayer.* Play azan at prayer times.* 5 cool themes with different colors to choose from, see screen shots!* Swype left and right to navigate between Prayers, Quibla and calendar* 2 cool widgets of sizes 4x3 and 4x1 for convenient usage that display calendar, prayers times and minutes before next azan, and provides easily access to the month calendar by taping on the calendar, access to quibla by taping on the location and access to the prayer time application by taping on the prayers times.

reviews.title: Best Prayer Times App I\'ve Had
reviews.comment: I have yet to experience a more user-friendly and resourceful Prayer Times App compared to this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Prayer App
reviews.comment: Excellent, a wonderful job on this app, I love. My sincere appreciation and prayers to the developer
reviews.author: Modou Conteh

reviews.title: Most complete
reviews.comment: The most complete prayer program, easy to use yet very powerful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and accurate
reviews.comment: This is the best azan application .simple and accurate.
reviews.author: Kinda Alsalah

reviews.title: Great can be improved
reviews.comment: Needs to have short azan, access to persona library for reminders tone, and Iqama as a reminder.
reviews.author: Radwa Abdelkader

reviews.title: May Allah reward you and your team
reviews.comment: I\'ve installed a few solat time app, but this is accurate and convenience for  my busy schedule daily. Good job....
reviews.author: ulubalang draja

reviews.title: Maa shah allah, good application
reviews.comment: Best compared to the rest.. Let allah SWT give is the strength to pray on time every time... maasalaama..
reviews.author: Afsal Ali Haneef

reviews.title: Its excellent
reviews.comment: I\'ve down loaded few prayer reminder b4 this one, but i want satisfied. This one is accurate,n simple to use & adjust. Jazzakom Allah khair.
reviews.author: Rawia Ahmed

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: User-friendly and an efficient app, but needs more accuracy in determining Qibla
reviews.author: Salma Adam

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I formatted my phone and I again searched the whole list for this app. It\'s awesome with cool widget so helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice app
reviews.comment: Will be nice it also forecast Islamic events. Also giving Ramadan timings of iftar and sehar will make this app really nice. Overall a nice decent app, Jazak\'Allah
reviews.author: Muneeb Jawed

reviews.title: Super like :)
reviews.comment: By far the best app I could find for Salat timings. Kuddos Mr. Developer/s. Keep up such great work. Thanks.
reviews.author: Irfan Najar

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: One of my favorite apps by far, i love it. Thank you so much and may Allah reward you for your hard work effort reminding us time for prayers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great apps
reviews.comment: I really like the app for its great features. It\'s also user-friendly. All in all, every Muslim should have the  app.
reviews.author: Alif Zaman

reviews.comment: Accurate, very ergonomic and really useful notifications which can be tailored to how you want them. Great app mashallah!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Muslim prayer timers
reviews.comment: It is a quite good software to be loved sweetly which is more friendly and good guide.
reviews.author: Abdul Rahim PKM

reviews.title: Fantastic app.
reviews.comment: Thanks for his superb app. Very useful and easy to operate. Jazakumullahu khairan kathira
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice interface.
reviews.comment: Elegant widget. Works as a charm. Jazak Allah khairan
